<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get WAN Network (v2.1)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.1/api/wannetworks/{wan_network_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a WAN network.
